channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: South African opposition leader Julius Malema is found guilty on gun charges

Looking to add a pet to your family? Nacho, Billy, others available at OKC-area shelters

item.description: Five unoccupied houses along North Carolina’s Outer Banks have collapsed into the ocean

item.title: DOJ sues LA sheriff for not giving out concealed carry licenses quickly enough
